<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover](/Feats.aspx?ID=2272) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 119</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All characters have access to this feat._

**Access**
Member of the Pathfinder Society.

**Trigger**
You gain no information from a [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) check (usually because you failed the [secret](/Traits.aspx?ID=142) check) using one of the two skills you chose for this feat. 

</column>

---

Kreighton teaches his students that an agile mind can glean clues leading to the truth, even from the most unlikely of sources. You immediately reattempt the triggering check using the other chosen skill.

**Special** When you gain this feat, choose two of the following skills: [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4), [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) (any one), [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10), [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13), or [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14).

<title level="2">Scrolls Training</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 119</row>

The Society's Master of Scrolls, Kreighton Shaine (_Lost Omens Pathfinder Society Guide_ page 42), may be considered strange and absent-minded by his peers, but the elf venture-captain takes his duties quite seriously. Skilled in researching obscure subjects and unraveling inscrutable secrets, Kreighton teaches his students the value of an inquisitive mind.

**Related Feats**:
name: Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover
